name: 3D Dot Game - Desertic Heroes
description:
This game was my first game developed with Unity and C#. I have developed this game in 2 months for a university subject. Most of the assets were self made. 

This game consists in a dungeon of 13 rooms and has a final boss, Anubis. It is a adventure-puzzle videogame. It also has 4 different enemies and each room has atleast one enemy.
